divs: sighting detailsjuly\august? 2007..flying from texas to california; when flying, i love taking pictures of clouds (formations, types of..etc..etc.) i have numerous pictures. at one point, i saw these three lights in the distant, when i put the phone\camera down to clean the lens (4 seconds, max) they were closer. then gone in a matter of seconds. i thought i was seeing things. can you please look at these and explain... i will be happy to submit other pictures upon request. a pilot friend of mine, stated they were "orbs" and he and other pilots saw them many times.
Summary: 3 lights above the clouds flying over nevada/arizona on my way to california
